      • addToHyPeerWeb

        public void addToHyPeerWeb(dbPhase.hypeerweb.Node newNode,
                  dbPhase.hypeerweb.Node startNode)
        Adds the to HyPeerWeb.
        Parameters:
        newNode - the new node
        startNode - the start node
        Precondition:
        newNode is a valid Node and startNode is contained with this valid HyPeerWeb
        Postcondition:
        this HyPeerWeb is valid, no nodes previously within HyPeerWeb have changed IDs, and HyPeerWeb contains newNode.
